headline: The Boeing Company (BA) and Honeywell Sued by Air India Crash Victim Families
summary: The Boeing Company (NYSE:BA) is among the 12 Best Defense Stocks to Buy Right Now. Families of four victims from June’s Air India crash have sued the aircraft manufacturer over the disaster that killed 260 people. Aerospace firm Honeywell is also a subject of the lawsuit. The victims’ families have blamed the two companies for […]

headline: 2 Cash-Producing Stocks with Exciting Potential and 1 We Ignore
summary: Generating cash is essential for any business, but not all cash-rich companies are great investments. Some produce plenty of cash but fail to allocate it effectively, leading to missed opportunities.
